text.section:
As used in KRS 304.17A-740 to 304.17A-743, unless the context otherwise requires:
"Administrator" has the meaning provided in KRS 304.9-051;
"Auditing entity" means an insurer or an administrator that conducts or arranges for the performance of an audit of a pharmacy's records for the purpose of determining compliance with pharmacy benefit requirements; and
"Insurer" has the meaning provided in KRS 304.17A-005.

A provider agreement or provider contract between a pharmacy and an insurer, an agency of the Commonwealth, a pharmacy benefits administrator, or a pharmacy benefits manager that allows an audit of the pharmacy's records by an auditing entity shall comply with KRS 304.17A-741 and 304.17A-743.

law.history: Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2009.
